Title: Episode 3
Plot: Meredith now has evidence that connects Lee Kaa to the missing girl, Shelly. Meredith's visions become more vivid and terrifying, and the visions seem to be dragging her towards the island of Kaitangata. She ties herself to the bed to try and stop herself from dreaming. But the island continues to loom large.
GuestStars: Robert Gilbert as Eric Ponty, Angus Benfield as Tom, Sheryl Morris as Mrs Reynolds, Charles Koroncho as Kaitangata Alasdair Kinkaid as Angry Driver
